title: Should "Fully charged" display all the time once the phone has charged whilst plugged in?
content:
When my device has fully charged, the always on display shows "Fully charged" for say a couple of minutes, and then displays "100%" for a couple minutes. The display constantly alternates between the two until I unplug the phone. 

The Pixel 3 I had previously always displayed "Fully charged" until I unplugged it.

Is there an issue with my device or charger, or is it an issue with the always on display?
